name: Expert Hunter Vs Dino
description: Experience the thrill of being an real dino hunter in the terrible jungle. Be the best shooter and survival. In this game multiple level make game more adventure. You can run and save from dino because when you near dino then dino move for killing you. So you make expert shooter and kill dino sharply. For better shooting crazy thrill we have added different types of assault weapons and all of them are real adventure of dinosaur shooting.  You should  be strong enough to challenge the monster dino and defeat him. You should never to miss this simulator game. This arcade & adventure game has HD awesome graphics. So why are you waiting just pick this game and show shooting skill.
